tool_description: Generates tailored interview questions based on job role, industry, experience level, and specific skill focus areas for mock interview preparation.

industry.description: Industry sector (e.g., technology, healthcare, finance, marketing)

experience_level.description: Candidate experience level: entry, mid, senior, executive

error_messages: Invalid experience level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive]
Question count out of range: Provide a value between 1 and 30
Invalid difficulty level: Use one of [basic, intermediate, advanced]
Empty question types: Provide at least one question type
Unsupported industry: Provide a recognized industry name
usage: Specify job_role, industry, experience_level, and question_types array. Optionally set skill_focus, question_count, and difficulty_level. Returns generated questions with metadata.
